description: Photics HS Thermo Bomber Jacket. Laser-fused, waterproof down jacket. A revolutionary, trendy bomber-style jacket with MAMMUT® Laser Fuse Technology™, which joins two materials via laser light, creating completely sealed seams without needle holes. No water penetration, no loss of down. Precise body mapping through the unrestricted design of the insulation zones. Photics. The revolutionary new down jacket.
name: Mammut Photics HS Thermo Bomber Jacket - Unisex

specs.value: Laser welded seams without stitching to avoid down leakage; narrow seams reduce cold spots for better heat retention
